name: Trozzle
description:
Trozzle v1.3 is Out!

Trozzle is a puzzle game with 45 Levels and 5 Boss Levels to compete! How cool is that?! I know you will have some hard time finishing this game,

Good Luck!

System Requirements:

Size: at least 188mb

Memory: 620mb of ram

What's New?!

Version 1.3: May 08,2016

-You can now play Boss Levels with multiple players

Version 1.2: May 06, 2016

-Fixed Levels that are unplayable
